speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
How
               
              goes
               
              the
               
              day
               
              with
               
              us
              ?
               
              O
              ,
               
              tell
               
              me
              ,
               
              Hubert
              .

speaker: HUBERT
text:
Badly
              ,
               
              I
               
              fear
              .
               
              How
               
              fares
               
              your
               
              Majesty
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
This
               
              fever
               
              that
               
              hath
               
              troubled
               
              me
               
              so
               
              long

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
Lies
               
              heavy
               
              on
               
              me
              .
               
              O
              ,
               
              my
               
              heart
               
              is
               
              sick
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              your
               
              valiant
               
              kinsman
              ,
               
              Faulconbridge
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Desires
               
              your
               
              Majesty
               
              to
               
              leave
               
              the
               
              field

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              send
               
              him
               
              word
               
              by
               
              me
               
              which
               
              way
               
              you
               
              go
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
Tell
               
              him
               
              toward
               
              Swinstead
              ,
               
              to
               
              the
               
              abbey
               
              there
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Be
               
              of
               
              good
               
              comfort
              ,
               
              for
               
              the
               
              great
               
              supply

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
That
               
              was
               
              expected
               
              by
               
              the
               
              Dauphin
               
              here

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Are
               
              wracked
               
              three
               
              nights
               
              ago
               
              on
               
              Goodwin
               
              Sands
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
This
               
              news
               
              was
               
              brought
               
              to
               
              Richard
               
              but
               
              even
               
              now
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              French
               
              fight
               
              coldly
               
              and
               
              retire
               
              themselves
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
Ay
               
              me
              ,
               
              this
               
              tyrant
               
              fever
               
              burns
               
              me
               
              up

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
And
               
              will
               
              not
               
              let
               
              me
               
              welcome
               
              this
               
              good
               
              news
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
Set
               
              on
               
              toward
               
              Swinstead
              .
               
              To
               
              my
               
              litter
               
              straight
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              JOHN
text:
Weakness
               
              possesseth
               
              me
              ,
               
              and
               
              I
               
              am
               
              faint
              .
